artist: Ange-Laurent de La Live de Jully
title: No. 54: Marie Gabriel Comte de Choiseuil et Michel Felix Chevalier de Choiseuil, from a recueil of etchings
marks:
Signature
 LLC, in the plate: [Drouais pinx.]; LRC below the
description: two little boys wearing large hats and long coats in a rocky landscape, accompanied by dog; boy on R unlocks a box on which he rests his proper R arm; inscription below
